Sentencas: Several measures concerning fuel processing in a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) system offer the possibility of significant cost reduction and higher system efficiencies.
Titulo: Pre-reforming of natural gas in solid oxide fuel-cell systems

Sentencas: For SOFC systems, the ratio between internal and pre-reforming has to be optimized on the basis of experimental performance data.
Titulo: Pre-reforming of natural gas in solid oxide fuel-cell systems

Sentencas: Furthermore, anode gas recycling by an injector in front of the pre-reformer can eliminate the steam generator and the corresponding heat of evaporation.
Titulo: Pre-reforming of natural gas in solid oxide fuel-cell systems

Sentencas: A detailed study is carried out on pre-reforming in a reformer of considerable size (10 kW(el)).
Titulo: Pre-reforming of natural gas in solid oxide fuel-cell systems

Sentencas: Simulating anode gas recycling with an injector, the influence of carbon dioxide on reactor performance was studied.
Titulo: Pre-reforming of natural gas in solid oxide fuel-cell systems

Sentencas: Also, the dependence of the methanol conversion on mass flow and temperature will be discussed.
Titulo: Pre-reforming of natural gas in solid oxide fuel-cell systems

Sentencas: In addition, some results concerning the dynamic behaviour of the pre-reformer are given.
